verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> If a soul כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תֶחֱטָ֔א <S%H2398><s%> sin וּמָעֲלָ֥ה <S%H4603><s%> and commit מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> a trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְכִחֵ֨שׁ <S%H3584><s%> and lie בַּעֲמִית֜וֹ <S%H5997><s%> unto his neighbour בְּפִקָּד֗וֹן <S%H6487><s%> in that which was delivered אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or בִתְשׂ֤וּמֶת <S%H8667><s%> A security יָד֙ <S%H3027><s%> entrusted א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְגָזֵ֔ל <S%H1498><s%> or in a thing taken away by violence א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עָשַׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> or hath deceived אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5997><s%> his neighbour

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or מָצָ֧א <S%H4672><s%> Or have found אֲבֵדָ֛ה <S%H9><s%> that which was lost וְכִ֥חֶשׁ <S%H3584><s%> and lieth בָּ֖הּ וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> concerning it and sweareth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> regard שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> regard אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> in any מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> one אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> doeth הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of all these that a man לַחֲטֹ֥א <S%H2398><s%> sinning בָהֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> therein

וְהָיָה֮ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> shall be when יֶחֱטָ֣א <S%H2398><s%> Then it shall be because he hath sinned וְאָשֵׁם֒ <S%H816><s%> and is guilty וְהֵשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> that he shall restore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגְּזֵלָ֜ה <S%H1497><s%> which he took violently away אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what גָּזָ֗ל <S%H1497><s%> robbery א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹ֙שֶׁק֙ <S%H6233><s%> or the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׁ֔ק <S%H6231><s%> which he hath deceitfully gotten א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפִּקָּד֔וֹן <S%H6487><s%> the deposit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הָפְקַ֖ד <S%H6487><s%> the deposit אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲבֵדָ֖ה <S%H9><s%> or the lost thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מָצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> which he found

א֠וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִכֹּ֞ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> Or all that about which he hath sworn עָלָיו֮ <S%H5921><s%> and לַשֶּׁקֶר֒ <S%H8267><s%> falsely וְשִׁלַּ֤ם <S%H7999><s%> he shall even restore אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּרֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> it in the principal וַחֲמִשִׁתָ֖יו <S%H2549><s%> the fifth part יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> more עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> to the one לַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he ל֛וֹ יִתְּנֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> thereto [and] give בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> it unto him to whom it appertaineth in the day אַשְׁמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H819><s%> of his trespass offering

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמ֥וֹ <S%H817><s%> his trespass offering יָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> a ram תָּמִ֧ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֛אן <S%H6629><s%> out of the flock בְּעֶרְכְּךָ֥ <S%H6187><s%> with thy estimation לְאָשָׁ֖ם <S%H817><s%> for a trespass offering אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest

וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for him before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> and it shall be forgiven ל֑וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> him for any thing מִכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> of the things אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> of all that he hath done לְאַשְׁמָ֥ה <S%H819><s%> in trespassing בָֽהּ׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

צַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> Command אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> itself הָעֹלָ֡ה <S%H5930><s%> It [is] the burnt offering עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> on מוֹקְדָ֨ה <S%H4169><s%> because of the burning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <S%H3915><s%> all night עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> unto the morning וְאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> and the fire הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar תּ֥וּקַד <S%H3344><s%> shall be burning בּֽוֹ׃

וְלָבַ֨שׁ <S%H3847><s%> shall put הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest מִדּ֣וֹ <S%H4055><s%> garment בַ֗ד <S%H906><s%> on his linen וּמִֽכְנְסֵי־ <S%H4370><s%> breeches בַד֮ <S%H906><s%> and his linen יִלְבַּ֣שׁ <S%H3847><s%> shall he put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> next בְּשָׂרוֹ֒ <S%H1320><s%> upon his flesh וְהֵרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> and take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֗שֶׁן <S%H1880><s%> the ashes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תֹּאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> hath consumed הָאֵ֛שׁ <S%H784><s%> which the fire אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> with the burnt offering עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> next הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> on the altar וְשָׂמ֕וֹ <S%H7760><s%> and he shall put אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> them beside הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> the altar

וּפָשַׁט֙ <S%H6584><s%> And he shall put off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his garments וְלָבַ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and put on בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> garments אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other וְהוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> and carry forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֙שֶׁן֙ <S%H1880><s%> the ashes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> unto a clean

וְהָאֵ֨שׁ <S%H784><s%> And the fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar תּֽוּקַד־ <S%H3344><s%> shall be burning בּוֹ֙ לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִכְבֶּ֔ה <S%H3518><s%> in it it shall not be put out וּבִעֵ֨ר <S%H1197><s%> shall burn עָלֶ֧יהָ <S%H5921><s%> out הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> wood בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> on it every morning בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning וְעָרַ֤ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in order עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> out הָֽעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> and lay the burnt offering וְהִקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> upon it and he shall burn עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and חֶלְבֵ֥י <S%H2459><s%> thereon the fat הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings

אֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> The fire תָּמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> shall ever תּוּקַ֥ד <S%H3344><s%> be burning עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not תִכְבֶֽה׃ <S%H3518><s%> it shall never go out ס

וְזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> And this [is] the law הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering הַקְרֵ֨ב <S%H7126><s%> shall offer אֹתָ֤הּ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> it before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> the altar

וְהֵרִ֨ים <S%H7311><s%> And he shall take מִמֶּ֜נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּקֻמְצ֗וֹ <S%H7062><s%> of it his handful מִסֹּ֤לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of the flour הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering וּמִשַּׁמְנָ֔הּ <S%H8081><s%> and of the oil וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלְּבֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> thereof and all the frankincense אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַמִּנְחָ֑ה <S%H4503><s%> which [is] upon the meat offering וְהִקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> and shall burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar רֵ֧יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֛חַ <S%H5207><s%> [for] a sweet אַזְכָּרָתָ֖הּ <S%H234><s%> [even] the memorial לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of it unto the LORD

וְהַנּוֹתֶ֣רֶת <S%H3498><s%> And the remainder מִמֶּ֔נָּה <S%H4480><s%> are to יֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> eat אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> thereof shall Aaron וּבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons מַצּ֤וֹת <S%H4682><s%> with unleavened bread תֵּֽאָכֵל֙ <S%H398><s%> shall it be eaten בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָדֹ֔שׁ <S%H6918><s%> in the holy בַּחֲצַ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation יֹאכְלֽוּהָ׃ <S%H398><s%> they shall eat

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵאָפֶה֙ <S%H644><s%> It shall not be baken חָמֵ֔ץ <S%H2557><s%> with leaven חֶלְקָ֛ם <S%H2506><s%> it [unto them for] their portion נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> מֵאִשָּׁ֑י <S%H801><s%> of my offerings made by fire קֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> holy הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he כַּחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> as [is] the sin offering וְכָאָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> and as the trespass offering

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every זָכָ֞ר <S%H2145><s%> All the males בִּבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> among the children אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> of Aaron יֹֽאכֲלֶ֔נָּה <S%H398><s%> shall eat חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> of it [It shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> in your generations מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> Every אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִגַּ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> every one that toucheth בָּהֶ֖ם יִקְדָּֽשׁ׃ <S%H6942><s%> them shall be holy פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

זֶ֡ה <S%H2088><s%> This קָרְבַּן֩ <S%H7133><s%> This [is] the offering אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וּבָנָ֜יו <S%H1121><s%> and of his sons אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֣יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> which they shall offer לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הִמָּשַׁ֣ח <S%H4886><s%> when he is anointed אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עֲשִׂירִ֨ת <S%H6224><s%> the tenth part הָאֵפָ֥ה <S%H374><s%> of an ephah סֹ֛לֶת <S%H5560><s%> of fine flour מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> for a meat offering תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> perpetual מַחֲצִיתָ֣הּ <S%H4276><s%> half בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> of it in the morning וּמַחֲצִיתָ֖הּ <S%H4276><s%> and half בָּעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> thereof at night

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מַחֲבַ֗ת <S%H4227><s%> In a pan בַּשֶּׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil תֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> it shall be made מֻרְבֶּ֣כֶת <S%H7246><s%> [and when it is] baken תְּבִיאֶ֑נָּה <S%H935><s%> thou shalt bring תֻּפִינֵי֙ <S%H8601><s%> it in [and] the baken מִנְחַ֣ת <S%H4503><s%> of the meat offering פִּתִּ֔ים <S%H6595><s%> pieces תַּקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> shalt thou offer רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> [for] a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest הַמָּשִׁ֧יחַ <S%H4899><s%> that is anointed תַּחְתָּ֛יו <S%H8478><s%> his place מִבָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> in his stead shall offer אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> it [it is] a statute עוֹלָ֕ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּלִ֥יל <S%H3632><s%> it shall be wholly תָּקְטָֽר׃ <S%H6999><s%> burnt

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִנְחַ֥ת <S%H4503><s%> For every meat offering כֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> for the priest כָּלִ֥יל <S%H3632><s%> shall be wholly burnt תִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> it shall not be eaten פ

דַּבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַֽחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering בִּמְק֡וֹם <S%H4725><s%> In the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> where תִּשָּׁחֵ֨ט <S%H7819><s%> is killed הָעֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> where the burnt offering תִּשָּׁחֵ֤ט <S%H7819><s%> be killed הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> shall the sin offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> Anyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִגַּ֥ע <S%H5060><s%> Whatsoever shall touch בִּבְשָׂרָ֖הּ <S%H1320><s%> the flesh יִקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H6942><s%> thereof shall be holy וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> and when יִזֶּ֤ה <S%H5137><s%> and when there is sprinkled מִדָּמָהּ֙ <S%H1818><s%> of the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַבֶּ֔גֶד <S%H899><s%> thereof upon any garment אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> what יִזֶּ֣ה <S%H5137><s%> that whereon it was sprinkled עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and תְּכַבֵּ֖ס <S%H3526><s%> thou shalt wash בְּמָק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָדֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H6918><s%> in the holy

וּכְלִי־ <S%H3627><s%> vessel חֶ֛רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> But the earthen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תְּבֻשַּׁל־ <S%H1310><s%> wherein it is sodden בּ֖וֹ יִשָּׁבֵ֑ר <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if בִּכְלִ֤י <S%H3627><s%> pot נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> in a brasen בֻּשָּׁ֔לָה <S%H1310><s%> and if it be sodden וּמֹרַ֥ק <S%H4838><s%> it shall be both scoured וְשֻׁטַּ֖ף <S%H7857><s%> and rinsed בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> in water

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> All the males בַּכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> among the priests יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thereof it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> holy הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he
